name: slider
description:
Call startSlider({containerId, widthSlider, heightSlider, autoPlay, autoPlayTime, hideButtons, slideTransitionTime, startSlide }) to create slider.

@param {string} containerId - slider container id
@param {number} widthSlider - Set width of the slideshow.
@param {number} heightSlider - Set height of the slideshow.
@param {number} startSlide - Set the first slide in the slideshow.
@param {boolean} autoPlay - Set the slides autoplay.
@param {number} autoPlayTime - Set the slides autoplay inteval, ms
@param {boolean} hideButtons - Hide controls bar
@param {number} slideTransitionTime - Set the slides transition inteval, sec
